title: Calories in Half and Half
meta_description: Get calories in half and half per 2 tbsp serving, including full nutrition facts like fat, carbs, protein, and quick tweaks for your coffee or recipes.
assumptions: Standard fluid half-and-half cream (10-18% milkfat), pasteurized, no additives; 1 tbsp ≈15 ml or 15 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and processing; always check product labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: Two tablespoons of half-and-half provide about 40 kcal, mainly from fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tablespoon of half and half?
What is the fat content in half and half?
faqs.a: 2 tbsp has 3.4 g total fat, including 2.2 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does half and half have carbs or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 2 tbsp provides 1.2 g carbs (all sugars) and 0.8 g protein.

faqs.q: Calories in half and half vs. milk?
faqs.a: Half-and-half is higher at 40 kcal per 2 tbsp; whole milk is about 18 kcal.
Moderately—low carbs (1.2 g per 2 tbsp) but watch saturated fat intake.
